title: What is this font?
content:
Hi guys!

Can someone tell me which font is this??

Thanks a lot!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820174633/http:/typophile.com/files/logo.PNG) | 34.65 KB |
author: smmg

comments.content:
If you look at the Typophile Forum page -- where all forums are listed, Under the General Discussion listing -- where you've just posted -- you see this:

All topics are welcome—except font ID requests.

Fortunately for people wanting fonts identified, there is a completely separate forum, frequented by people who delight in answering such questions
